title: Step 27

challengeFiles.name: main

tests.text: You should print '2. List all expenses' in your while loop after the existing print() calls.
tests.testString:
({ test: () => assert(runPython(`
call_lst = _Node(_code).find_function("main").find_whiles()[0].find_bodies()[0].find_calls("print")
test_lst = ["print('\\\\nExpense Tracker')", "print('1. Add an expense')", "print('2. List all expenses')"]
all(call_lst[n].is_equivalent(i) for n, i in enumerate(test_lst))
`)) })

description: Next, add another print() call and pass the string '2. List all expenses'.
